posts.post_content:
[STRIKE]$385[/STRIKE] delivered within the United States.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions.[/URL]

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol dot com [/URL]

I'd like to get this sold. You have an idea what I think it's worth (which obviously is too high). If you're interested, please make a reasonable offer, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Thanks.
